verses.text_plain: I will extol thee, O Lord; for thou hast lifted me up, and hast not made my foes to rejoice over me.
verses.verse_html: 1I will extol thee, O Lord; for thou hast lifted me up, and hast not made my foes to rejoice over me.

tokens.text: for thou hast lifted me up
and hast not made my foes

verses.text_plain: O Lord my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me.
verses.verse_html: 2O Lord my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me.

tokens.text: unto thee, and thou hast healed

verses.text_plain: O Lord, thou hast brought up my soul from the grave: thou hast kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.
verses.verse_html: 3O Lord, thou hast brought up my soul from the grave: thou hast kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.

tokens.text: that I should not go down

verses.text_plain: Sing unto the Lord, O ye saints of his, and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
verses.verse_html:
4Sing unto the Lord, O ye saints of his, and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness. ▼
▼ at…: or, to the memorial

footnotes.body_html: ▼ at…: or, to the memorial

verses.text_plain: For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
verses.verse_html:
5For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning. ▼
▼ his anger…: Heb. there is but a moment in his anger
 , ▼
▼ for a night: Heb. in the evening
 , ▼
▼ joy: Heb. singing

footnotes.body_text: ▼ his anger…: Heb. there is but a moment in his anger
footnotes.body_html: ▼ his anger…: Heb. there is but a moment in his anger

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for a night: Heb. in the evening
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for a night: Heb. in the evening

verses.text_plain: And in my prosperity I said, I shall never be moved.
verses.verse_html: 6And in my prosperity I said, I shall never be moved.

verses.text_plain: Lord, by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong: thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled.
verses.verse_html:
7Lord, by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong: thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled. ▼
▼ made…: Heb. settled strength for my mountain

footnotes.body_text: ▼ made…: Heb. settled strength for my mountain
footnotes.body_html: ▼ made…: Heb. settled strength for my mountain

verses.text_plain: I cried to thee, O Lord; and unto the Lord I made supplication.
verses.verse_html: 8I cried to thee, O Lord; and unto the Lord I made supplication.

verses.text_plain: What profit is there in my blood, when I go down to the pit? Shall the dust praise thee? shall it declare thy truth?
verses.verse_html: 9What profit is there in my blood, when I go down to the pit? Shall the dust praise thee? shall it declare thy truth?

verses.text_plain: Hear, O Lord, and have mercy upon me: Lord, be thou my helper.
verses.verse_html: 10Hear, O Lord, and have mercy upon me: Lord, be thou my helper.

verses.text_plain: Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing: thou hast put off my sackcloth, and girded me with gladness;
verses.verse_html: 11Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing: thou hast put off my sackcloth, and girded me with gladness;

verses.text_plain: To the end that my glory may sing praise to thee, and not be silent. O Lord my God, I will give thanks unto thee for ever.
verses.verse_html:
12To the end that my glory may sing praise to thee, and not be silent. O Lord my God, I will give thanks unto thee for ever. ▼
▼ my glory: that is, my tongue, or, my soul

tokens.text: praise to thee, and not be silent

footnotes.body_text: ▼ my glory: that is, my tongue, or, my soul
footnotes.body_html: ▼ my glory: that is, my tongue, or, my soul
